channel.title: Hacking JavaScript
channel.description:
Go to google or youtube.com or anything like that(myspace, youtube, google, google images etc...)
Copy and paste this code into the address bar and click go or enter.
Code:
javascript:R=0; x1=.1; y1=.05; x2=.25; y2=.24; x3=1.6; y3=.24;x4=300;y4=200; x5=300; y5=200;DI=document.images; DIL=DI.length;function A(){for(i=0; i-DIL; i++){DIS=DI[ i ].style;DIS.position='absolute'; DIS.left=Math.sin (R*x1+i*x2+x3)*x4+x5;DIS.top=Math .cos(R*y1+i*y2+y3)*y4+y5}R++}setInterval('A()',5); void(0);
Lol this is so awesome!

item.title: Hacking JavaScript

item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“lawl, post:1, topic:68375”]jme told me this ;o

doesnt work on firefox btw[/quote]

Yes it does, you need javascript enabled, or click “Enable Global Scripts” if your using the noscript extension.

item.title: Hacking JavaScript
item.dc:creator: @Jeff_Hardy_0wns Jeff_Hardy_0wns
item.description:
@Jeff_Hardy_0wns wrote:

Go to google or youtube.com or anything like that(myspace, youtube, google, google images etc…)

Copy and paste this code into the address bar and click go or enter.

Code:

javascript:R=0; x1=.1; y1=.05; x2=.25; y2=.24; x3=1.6; y3=.24;x4=300;y4=200; x5=300; y5=200;DI=document.images; DIL=DI.length;function A(){for(i=0; i-DIL; i++){DIS=DI[ i ].style;DIS.position=‘absolute’; DIS.left=Math.sin (Rx1+ix2+x3)x4+x5;DIS.top=Math .cos(Ry1+i*y2+y3)*y4+y5}R++}setInterval(‘A()’,5); void(0);

Lol this is so awesome!
